episodes.title: 'Cults Like Us: Why Doomsday Thinking Drives America'
episodes.description:
New book about the history of cult ideologies in America, and how the country remains a breeding ground for cult-like thinking. Culture journalist Jane Borden uncovers the American history you didn’t learn in school, including how we are still being brainwashed, making us a nation of easy marks for con artists and strong men. 

janeborden.com
Instagram & X: @janeborden
